properties.entry: SELECT DISTINCT DELIVERY_DT, PRODUCT_IMG_PATH, PRODUCT_NM, ORDER_AMOUNT, D.DELIVERY_NO, PRODUCT_PRICE, ORDER_STATUS_NM FROM ORDER_1 O JOIN MEMBER M ON(O.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(O.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN PRODUCT_IMG I ON(O.PRODUCT_NO = I.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN DELIVERY D ON(O.MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATUS USING(ORDER_STATUS_CD) WHERE O.MEMBER_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_IMG_LEVEL=0

SELECT DISTINCT DELIVERY_DT, PRODUCT_IMG_PATH, PRODUCT_NM, ORDER_AMOUNT, D.DELIVERY_NO, PRODUCT_PRICE, ORDER_STATUS_NM FROM ORDER_1 O JOIN MEMBER M ON(O.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(O.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN PRODUCT_IMG I ON(O.PRODUCT_NO = I.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN DELIVERY D ON(O.MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATUS USING(ORDER_STATUS_CD) WHERE O.MEMBER_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_IMG_LEVEL=0 AND ORDER_STATUS_NM LIKE '%취소' OR ORDER_STATUS_NM LIKE '%교환' OR ORDER_STATUS_NM LIKE '%환불'
